def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Wes.Components import CommandsUtility from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState
entity = widget.Entity if entity == None: return widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONSULTARCNPJ"].Visible = widget.Entity.VisibilidadeComandoConsultarCnpj
